byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

lead_paragraph: Arrested while covering the protests in Ferguson, Mo., in August 2014, reporters for the Washington Post and Huffington Post face trespassing charges.

headline.main: Arrested in Ferguson Last Year, 2 Reporters Are Charged
headline.print_headline: One Year Later, 2 Reporters Are Charged

snippet: Arrested while covering the protests in Ferguson, Mo., in August 2014, reporters for the Washington Post and Huffington Post face trespassing charges.
